sense.def:
Jam
je živilo, pripravljeno s kuhanjem sadja s sladkorjem. Navadno ga namažemo na kruh.

To jam something somewhere
pomeni nekaj grobo nekam pritisniti.

seg.quote: Then he jammed his hat back on.
Reporters jammed microphones in our faces.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
jams
ali kadar človek
jams something
pomeni, da tisto obtiči v določenem položaju in se ne more prosto gibati ali delovati.

seg.quote: The machines jammed and broke down.

sense.def:
Kadar veliko stvari
are jammed into a place
, so tako stisnjene skupaj, da se komaj lahko premikajo.

seg.quote: The town was jammed with traffic.

sense.def:
A jam
je položaj, v katerem je toliko vozil na cesti, da se nobeno od njih ne more premakniti.

seg.quote: There were traffic jams, and police clearing people away.

sense.def:
To be in a jam
pomeni biti v zelo težavnem položaju;

cit.quote: biti v godlji, biti v kaši

seg.quote: He finds himself in exactly the same jam as his brother was in ten years before.

sense.def:
To jam a radio or electronic signal
pomeni vmešati se v radijski ali elektronski signal in preprečiti, da bi ga jasno sprejemali.
